cards.name: Abyssal Specter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.
cards.flavor:
"Open the gates, and bid them enter."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

cards.name: Balduvian Bears
cards.flavor:
"They're a hardy bunch, but I'd still bet that they just slept through the worst of the cold times."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Balduvian Horde
cards.text: When Balduvian Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.
cards.flavor:
"Peace will come only when we have taken Varchild's head."
—Lovisa Coldeyes,
Balduvian Chieftain

cards.name: Barbed Sextant
cards.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Barbed Sextant: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

cards.name: Bounty of the Hunt
cards.text:
You may exile a green card from your hand rather than pay Bounty of the Hunt's mana cost.
Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures. For each +1/+1 counter you put on a creature this way, remove a +1/+1 counter from that creature at the beginning of the next cleanup step.

cards.name: Contagion
cards.text:
You may pay 1 life and exile a black card from your hand rather than pay Contagion's mana cost.
Distribute two -2/-1 counters among one or two target creatures.

cards.name: Dark Banishing
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:
"Will not the mountains quake and hills melt at the coming of the darkness? Share this vision with your enemies, Lim-Dûl, and they shall wither."
—Leshrac, Walker of Night

cards.name: Dark Ritual
cards.text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"Leshrac, my liege, grant me the power I am due."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

cards.name: Death Spark
cards.text:
Death Spark deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Death Spark is in your graveyard with a creature card directly above it, you may pay {1}. If you do, return Death Spark to your hand.

cards.name: Elkin Bottle
cards.text: {3}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card.

cards.name: Elvish Bard
cards.text: All creatures able to block Elvish Bard do so.

cards.name: Folk of the Pines
cards.text: {1}{G}: Folk of the Pines gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Our friends of the forest take many forms, yet all serve the will of Freyalise."
—Laina of the Elvish Council

cards.name: Foul Familiar
cards.text:
Foul Familiar can't block.
{B}, Pay 1 life: Return Foul Familiar to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"Serve me, and live forever."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

cards.name: Fyndhorn Elves
cards.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"Living side by side with the Elves for so long leaves me with no doubt that we serve the same goddess."
—Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

cards.name: Giant Growth
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Here in Fyndhorn, the goddess Freyalise is generous to her children."
—Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

cards.name: Giant Trap Door Spider
cards.text: {1}{R}{G}, {T}: Exile Giant Trap Door Spider and target creature without flying that's attacking you.
cards.flavor:
"So large and so quiet—a combination best avoided."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Goblin Mutant
cards.text:
Trample
Goblin Mutant can't attack if defending player controls an untapped creature with power 3 or greater.
Goblin Mutant can't block creatures with power 3 or greater.
cards.flavor: If only it had three brains, too.

cards.name: Guerrilla Tactics
cards.text:
Guerrilla Tactics deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Guerrilla Tactics, Guerrilla Tactics deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Hurricane
cards.text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.
cards.flavor:
"This was quite possibly the least pleasant occurrence on the entire expedition."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Icy Manipulator
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.
cards.flavor:
"The scavengers who first found it called it the ‘Bone Crank.' Not a bad name, I'd say."
—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

cards.name: Incinerate
cards.text: Incinerate deals 3 damage to target creature or player. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Yes, I think ‘toast' is an appropriate description."
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

cards.name: Jokulhaups
cards.text: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:
"I was shocked when I first saw the aftermath of the Yavimaya Valley disaster. The raging waters had swept away trees, bridges, and even houses. My healers had much work to do."
—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

cards.name: Karplusan Forest
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Karplusan Forest deals 1 damage to you.

cards.name: Lava Burst
cards.text: Lava Burst deals X damage to target creature or player. If Lava Burst would deal damage to a creature, that damage can't be prevented or dealt instead to another creature or player.
cards.flavor:
"Overkill? This isn't a game of Kick-the-Ouphe!"
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

cards.name: Lhurgoyf
cards.text: Lhurgoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.
cards.flavor:
"Ach! Hans, run! It's the Lhurgoyf!"
—Saffi Eriksdotter, last words

cards.name: Lim-Dûl's High Guard
cards.text:
First strike
{1}{B}: Regenerate Lim-Dûl's High Guard.
cards.flavor: "The Guard will forever stand ready. For them, death is merely an inconvenience, not an ending."Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

cards.name: Necropotence
cards.text:
Skip your draw step.
Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.
Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

cards.name: Orcish Cannoneers
cards.text: {T}: Orcish Cannoneers deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to you.
cards.flavor:
"It's a thankless job, and you'll probably die in an explosion. But the pay is pretty good."
—Toothlicker Harj, Orcish Captain

cards.name: Phantasmal Fiend
cards.text:
{B}: Phantasmal Fiend gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{1}{U}: Switch Phantasmal Fiend's power and toughness until end of turn.

cards.name: Phyrexian War Beast
cards.text: When Phyrexian War Beast leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a land and Phyrexian War Beast deals 1 damage to you.
cards.flavor:
"Deal with the spawn of Phyrexia cautiously; only with time may we control them."
—Arcum Dagsson,
Soldevi Machinist

cards.name: Pillage
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:
"Were they to reduce us to ash, we would clog their throats and sting their eyes in payment."
—Lovisa Coldeyes,
Balduvian Chieftain

cards.name: Pyroclasm
cards.text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.
cards.flavor:
"Leaves more room for the big ones to fight in, you know."
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

cards.name: Shatter
cards.text: Destroy target artifact.
cards.flavor:
"Let the past be the past. Do not call up that which you cannot put down. Destroy that which destroyed us, so long ago."
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

cards.name: Soul Burn
cards.text:
Spend only black and/or red mana on X.
Soul Burn deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more than the amount of {B} spent on X, the player's life total before Soul Burn dealt damage, or the creature's toughness.

cards.name: Storm Shaman
cards.text: {R}: Storm Shaman gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Embrace the storm. Its voice shall echo within you, and its fire shall become your touch!"
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

cards.name: Sulfurous Springs
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Sulfurous Springs deals 1 damage to you.

cards.name: Underground River
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Underground River deals 1 damage to you.

cards.name: Walking Wall
cards.text:
Defender
{3}: Walking Wall gets +3/-1 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Activate this ability only once each turn.
cards.flavor:
"The fortress is not what it seems."
—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

cards.name: Woolly Spider
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever Woolly Spider blocks a creature with flying, Woolly Spider gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"We need not fear the forces of the air; I've yet to see a Spider without an appetite."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

cards.name: Yavimaya Ancients
cards.text: {G}: Yavimaya Ancients gets +1/-2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"We orphans of Fyndhorn have found no welcome in this alient place."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

cards.name: Yavimaya Ants
cards.text:
Trample, haste
Cumulative upkeep {G}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
cards.flavor:
"Few natural forces are as devastating as hunger."
—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order
